languages.text: "Пути, которыми я прошла, многому меня научили. Прозревать истину там, где она сокрыта. И без колебаний отсекать голову лживой змее, пытающейся обвиться кольцом вокруг сердца". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на эльдара не мигая, и ярость отражается в ее глазах.{/n} "Если целый совет провидцев не смог предвидеть гибель своего мира, тогда все, что сотни лет рассказывали Детям Азуриана о Путях, было ложью. Ты что-то скрываешь, Эклендиль. Говори. Сейчас же".

traits.locale_text: "Пути, которыми я прошла, многому меня научили. Зрить истину там, где она сокрыта. И без колебаний отсекать голову лживой змее, пытающейся обвиться кольцом вокруг сердца". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на эльдара немигая, и ярость отражается в ее глазах.{/n} "Если целый совет провидцев не смог предвидеть гибель своего мира, тогда все, что сотни лет разссказывали детям Азуриан о Путях, было ложью. Ты что-то скрываешь, Эклендиль. Говори. Сейчас же".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."
languages.original_text: "Пути, которыми я прошла, многому меня научили. Прозревать истину там, где она сокрыта. И без колебаний отсекать голову лживой змее, пытающейся обвиться кольцом вокруг сердца". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на эльдара не мигая, и ярость отражается в ее глазах.{/n} "Если целый совет провидцев не смог предвидеть гибель своего мира, тогда все, что сотни лет рассказывали Детям Азуриана о Путях, было ложью. Ты что-то скрываешь, Эклендиль. Говори. Сейчас же".

You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Las sendas que he recorrido me han enseñado mucho. A distinguir la verdad cuando esté oculta. Y a no dudar nunca cuando deba decapitar a una serpiente embustera que intente enroscarse en torno a mi corazón». {n}Yrliet observa a su camarada Aeldari sin pestañear; sus ojos echan chispas de furia.{/n} «Si en todo el consejo de videntes no hubo nadie capaz de predecir la destrucción de su mundo, entonces todo cuanto nos han inculcado a los hijos de Asuryan a lo largo de los siglos es mentira. Ocultas algo, Eklendyl. Habla. Habla ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: «Las sendas que he recorrido me han enseñado mucho. A distinguir la verdad cuando esté oculta. Y a no dudar nunca cuando deba decapitar a una serpiente embustera que intente enroscarse en torno a mi corazón». {n}Yrliet observa a su camarada Aeldari sin pestañear; sus ojos echan chispas de furia.{/n} «Si en todo el consejo de videntes no hubo nadie capaz de predecir la destrucción de su mundo, entonces todo cuanto nos han inculcado a los hijos de Asuryan a lo largo de los siglos es mentira. Ocultas algo, Eklendyl. Habla. Habla ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我が歩んだ道は多くのことを教えてくれた。隠された真実を見抜くこと、そしてこの心にまとわりつこうとする嘘つきの蛇の頭を躊躇わずに切り落とすことを」{n}ユリエットは怒りで目を光らせ、仲間のアエルダリを瞬きもせずに見つめる。{/n} 「先見司の評議会が己の世界の破滅を予見できなかったのなら、何世紀にもわたってアシュリアンの御子らが教わってきた道についてのすべてが嘘ということになる。あなたは何かを隠しているな、エクレンディル。話してくれ、今すぐにだ」
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: 「我が歩んだ道は多くのことを教えてくれた。隠された真実を見抜くこと、そしてこの心にまとわりつこうとする嘘つきの蛇の頭を躊躇わずに切り落とすことを」{n}ユリエットは怒りで目を光らせ、仲間のアエルダリを瞬きもせずに見つめる。{/n} 「先見司の評議会が己の世界の破滅を予見できなかったのなら、何世紀にもわたってアシュリアンの御子らが教わってきた道についてのすべてが嘘ということになる。あなたは何かを隠しているな、エクレンディル。話してくれ、今すぐにだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我走过的道途教会了我很多东西。要我发现隐藏的真相，要我毫不犹豫砍下那条缠绕我心灵的毒蛇的头。”{n}伊莉耶特目不转睛地盯着她的艾达灵族同胞，眼中闪烁着怒火。{/n}“如果整个先知议会都没能预见到世界的末日，那这千万年来，阿苏焉之子所谓的道途也不过全都是谎言罢了。你在对我隐瞒某些事情，埃克伦迪。快说，现在就告诉我。”
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: “我走过的道途教会了我很多东西。要我发现隐藏的真相，要我毫不犹豫砍下那条缠绕我心灵的毒蛇的头。”{n}伊莉耶特目不转睛地盯着她的艾达灵族同胞，眼中闪烁着怒火。{/n}“如果整个先知议会都没能预见到世界的末日，那这千万年来，阿苏焉之子所谓的道途也不过全都是谎言罢了。你在对我隐瞒某些事情，埃克伦迪。快说，现在就告诉我。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Voies que j'ai suivies m'ont beaucoup appris. À voir la vérité lorsqu'elle n'apparaît pas clairement. Et à ne pas hésiter à couper la tête du serpent sournois qui tente d'enserrer mon cœur. » {n}Yrliet fixe sans sourciller son camarade aeldari, le regard empli de rage.{/n} « Si le conseil des Grands Prophètes n'est pas parvenu à voir la chute de son monde, tout ce qu'on apprend depuis des siècles aux enfants d'Asuryan sur les Voies n'est qu'un mensonge. Vous cachez quelque chose, Eklendyl. Parlez. Maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: « Les Voies que j'ai suivies m'ont beaucoup appris. À voir la vérité lorsqu'elle n'apparaît pas clairement. Et à ne pas hésiter à couper la tête du serpent sournois qui tente d'enserrer mon cœur. » {n}Yrliet fixe sans sourciller son camarade aeldari, le regard empli de rage.{/n} « Si le conseil des Grands Prophètes n'est pas parvenu à voir la chute de son monde, tout ce qu'on apprend depuis des siècles aux enfants d'Asuryan sur les Voies n'est qu'un mensonge. Vous cachez quelque chose, Eklendyl. Parlez. Maintenant. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Meine beschrittenen Pfade haben mich sehr viel gelehrt. Die Wahrheit zu erkennen, wo sie verborgen ist. Und nicht zu zögern, einer hinterhältigen Schlange den Kopf abzuschlagen, wenn sie sich einem ums Herz wickelt." {n}Yrliet fixiert den anderen Aeldari, ohne zu blinzeln – ihre Augen glänzen vor Wut.{/n} "Wenn keiner im Rat der Runenpropheten den Untergang ihrer Welt voraussehen konnte, dann ist alles eine Lüge, was den Kinder von Asuryan seit Jahrhunderten über die Pfade beigebracht wurde. Ihr verbergt etwas, Eklendyl. Redet. Sofort."
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: "Meine beschrittenen Pfade haben mich sehr viel gelehrt. Die Wahrheit zu erkennen, wo sie verborgen ist. Und nicht zu zögern, einer hinterhältigen Schlange den Kopf abzuschlagen, wenn sie sich einem ums Herz wickelt. {n}Yrliet fixiert den anderen Aeldari, ohne zu blinzeln – ihre Augen glänzen vor Wut.{/n} "Wenn keiner im Rat der Runenpropheten den Untergang ihrer Welt voraussehen konnte, dann ist alles eine Lüge, was den Kinder von Asuryan seit Jahrhunderten über die Pfade beigebracht wurde. Ihr verbergt etwas, Eklendyl. Redet. Sofort."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yürüdüğüm Yollar, bana pek çok şey öğretti. Saklı olduğunda bile hakikati görebilmeyi, kalbimi sarıp sıkıştırmaya çalışan yalancı yılanın kafasını kesmekte tereddüt etmemeyi öğrendim." {n}Yrliet, Aeldari soydaşına gözlerini kırpmadan bakıyor. Gözlerindeki öfke, parıl parıl parlıyor.{/n} "Tüm Ötesezen konseyi toplanıp dünyalarının yaşayacağı felaketi öngöremediyse demek ki asırlardır Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na Yollar ile ilgili olarak öğretilen her şey yalanmış. Bir şeyler saklıyorsun Eklendyl. Konuş. Konuş dedim."
languages.original_text: "The Paths I have walked have taught me a great deal. To see the truth where it is concealed. And not to hesitate to cut off the head of a lying snake that tries to coil around my heart." {n}Yrliet stares unblinkingly at her fellow Aeldari, fury gleaming in her eyes.{/n} "If the entire Farseer council failed to foresee their world's doom, then everything the Children of Asuryan have been taught about Paths for centuries is a lie. You are hiding something, Eklendyl. Speak. Speak now."

traits.locale_text: "Yürüdüğüm Yollar, bana pek çok şey öğretti. Saklı olduğunda bile hakikati görebilmeyi ve kalbimi sıkıştırmaya çalışan yalancı bir yılanın kafasını kesmek için tereddüt etmemeyi öğrendim." {n}Yrliet, Aeldari soydaşına gözlerini bile kırpmadan bakıyor. Gözlerindeki öfke parıl parıl parlıyor.{/n} "Tüm Ötesezen konseyi toplanıp dünyalarının yaşayacağı felaketi öngöremediyse demek ki asırlar boyunca Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na Yollar'a dair öğretilen her şey yalanmış. Bir şeyler saklıyorsun Eklendyl. Konuş. Konuş, dedim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
